types.name: Dhuhr Prayer
types.description: Midday prayer after sun passes zenith

fajr.title: Make Intention
fajr.arabic: نَوَيْتُ أَنْ أُصَلِّيَ صَلاةَ الصُّبْحِ رَكْعَتَيْنِ فَرْضاً لِلَّهِ تَعَالَى
fajr.roman: Nawaitu an usalliya salatas subhi rak'atayni fardan lillahi ta'ala
fajr.description: I intend to pray the Fajr prayer, two rakats fard for Allah the Exalted. The intention is made in the heart, not spoken aloud.
fajr.notes: The intention must be sincere and for the sake of Allah alone.

fajr.title: Takbiratul Ihram
fajr.description: Raise your hands to your ears (men) or shoulders (women) and say 'Allahu Akbar' (Allah is the Greatest). This marks the beginning of the prayer.
fajr.notes: Keep your eyes on the place of prostration throughout the prayer.

fajr.title: Standing (Qiyam)
fajr.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ وَتَبَارَكَ اسْمُكَ وَتَعَالَى جَدُّكَ وَلاَ إِلَهَ غَيْرُكَ
fajr.roman: Subhanakallahumma wa bihamdika wa tabarakasmuka wa ta'ala jadduka wa la ilaha ghairuk
fajr.description: Place your right hand over left on your chest. Recite the opening supplication (Thana). Then recite Surah Al-Fatihah followed by another Surah or verses from Quran.
fajr.notes: Men should place hands below navel, women on chest.

fajr.title: Ruku (Bowing)
fajr.description: Bow down saying 'Allahu Akbar', place hands on knees, keep back straight, and recite 'Subhana Rabbiyal Adheem' (Glory to my Lord, the Great) three times.
fajr.notes: Keep your head level with your back, don't raise or lower it.

fajr.title: Standing from Ruku
fajr.arabic: سَمِعَ اللَّهُ لِمَنْ حَمِدَهُ رَبَّنَا وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ
fajr.roman: Sami'Allahu liman hamidah, Rabbana wa lakal hamd
fajr.description: Raise up from bowing saying 'Sami'Allahu liman hamidah' (Allah hears those who praise Him). When standing straight, say 'Rabbana wa lakal hamd' (Our Lord, to You is all praise).
fajr.notes: Stand straight and still before going to prostration.

fajr.title: Sujood (Prostration)
fajr.description: Go down to prostration saying 'Allahu Akbar'. Place forehead, nose, palms, knees, and toes on ground. Recite 'Subhana Rabbiyal A'la' (Glory to my Lord, the Most High) three times.
fajr.notes: Keep elbows away from sides for men, close for women.

fajr.title: Sitting between Prostrations
fajr.description: Sit up from prostration saying 'Allahu Akbar'. Sit on left foot with right foot upright. Place hands on thighs. Say 'Rabbighfir li' (O Lord, forgive me). Then perform second prostration.
fajr.notes: Maintain this position briefly before second prostration.

fajr.title: Second Rakat
fajr.description: Stand up for second rakat saying 'Allahu Akbar'. Repeat steps 3-7. After second prostration, remain seated for Tashahhud.
fajr.notes: The second rakat is similar to the first.

fajr.title: Tashahhud (Sitting)
fajr.arabic: التَّحِيَّاتُ لِلَّهِ وَالصَّلَوَاتُ وَالطَّيِّبَاتُ، السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ، السَّلَامُ عَلَيْنَا وَعَلَى عِبَادِ اللَّهِ الصَّالِحِينَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
fajr.roman: Attahiyyatu lillahi wassalawatu wattayyibatu. Assalamu alaika ayyuhannabiyyu wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh. Assalamu alaina wa ala ibadillahis salihin. Ashhadu an la ilaha illallah wa ashhadu anna Muhammadan abduhu wa rasuluh
fajr.description: After second rakat, sit and recite Tashahhud. Raise right index finger when saying 'Ashhadu an la ilaha illallah'.
fajr.notes: Sit on left foot, right foot upright.

fajr.title: Salam (Ending Prayer)
fajr.description: Turn head to right saying 'Assalamu alaikum wa rahmatullah' (Peace and mercy of Allah be upon you). Then turn to left and repeat.

dhuhr.title: Make Intention
dhuhr.arabic: نَوَيْتُ أَنْ أُصَلِّيَ صَلاةَ الظُّهْرِ أَرْبَعَ رَكَعَاتٍ فَرْضاً لِلَّهِ تَعَالَى
dhuhr.roman: Nawaitu an usalliya salataz zuhri arba'a raka'atin fardan lillahi ta'ala
dhuhr.description: I intend to pray the Dhuhr prayer, four rakats fard for Allah the Exalted.
dhuhr.notes: The intention is made in the heart before starting.
